0.title: What Is the Philadelphia Independents?
0.plot: Promotional video for Season One of The Philadelphia Independents. Defining who "we" are with one word.

1.title: Brian A. Wilson - An Actors Perspective
1.plot: Brian Anthony Wilson is an actor and producer from the Philadelphia area, known for Limitless (2011), Creed (2015), Law Abiding Citizen (2009), and many more great films and shows. Join The Philadelphia Independents as we take a look into his first hand experience in the industry.

2.title: David Boorboor - Open-minded Direction
2.plot: David Boorboor is a well-known writer and director in the Philadelphia area. He is best known for A Place in Hell (2015), Purity Code (2016), Underground (2016), with many to follow. In this episode of The Philadelphia Independents, we will explore David's journey and learn what it's taken to get him to where he is today.

3.title: Kat Carollo - Inside the Makeup Studio
3.plot: Kat Carollo is a Makeup Artist who is best known for her work on Fight Valley (2016) and Cold (2016). Her upcoming projects include lead makeup/hair/special effects on Con-8 (2016), Saddle-6 (2016), and Fight Valley 2 (2017). When Kat isn't working on a film set, you can find her every Tuesday as a featured guest host on theAskBONBONshow. In this episode, we will hear more about her journey to the makeup studio and beyond.

4.title: David Lowe-Bianco - A Filmmaker & A Canvas
4.plot: David Lowe-Bianco is a writer, director, and producer from the Philadelphia area. David is best known for his work on Emmy award winning film, The Other Side of the Fence (2015), as well as Weirdo (2017), Decisions We Make (2014) and Fisheye (2015). Currently working as an Associate Producer at MindTV, David is constantly surrounded by all things film. In this episode, we will take a look into the life and drive behind this talented filmmaker.

5.title: Loren Lepre - Taking Art on the Road
5.plot: Loren Lepre is a local Philadelphia director/writer/actor best known for his documentary Pennsylvania Hardcore (2014) and upcoming feature film, The Dark Military (2016). When moving to the area in 1999, Loren was a pro wrestler turned MMA fighter and soon after caught the acting bug. He is the owner of Average Superstar Films, which runs an active short film fest in Philly called "Freedom Shorts" and also created the networking group, Philly Philm Phunctions.

6.title: Rogelio Gonzalez - Be Your Own Rocky
6.plot: Rogelio Gonzalez is an actor/dancer from the Philadelphia area. Rogelio is best known for The Dark Military (2016), Nerd vs. Geek (2013), and Star Wars: Precious Cargo (2015). Currently, you can catch him as a featured dancer on Fuse networks, Dancin' on Air (2016) and Saturday Morning Fever (2016). Tune in to this episode to hear what Ro Ro Ro has to say about being your own hero.

7.title: Zane L'Erario - It's All About Time
7.plot: Zane L'Erario is an actor, writer, and director from the Philadelphia area. Zane is best known for his work in Worry Me Dead (2015), God Be With You (2015), and upcoming feature film They Are Strangers (2016). Tune in to get more insight into Zane's journey and what it's taken to get him to where he is today.

8.title: John DiRenzo - Believe in You
8.plot: John DiRenzo is an actor local to Philadelphia who is best known for his work in The Listing (2016), The Stall (2015), and Deadly Gamble (2015). John began his professional acting career at age 43, appearing as a background performer in After Earth (2012). Since then he has appeared in over 50 projects including short and feature films, television and commercial productions. Tune in to this episode to hear John speak about his experience in the industry thus far.

9.title: John McKeever - The Art of Laughter
9.plot: John McKeever is an actor and director in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania. He is best known for Kurbaan (2009), La méduse rouge (2013) and Delco Proper (2015). His work on the hilarious series, Delco Proper, got the attention of Comedy Central and currently has episodes online with the well-known network. Check out this episode to hear about John's ongoing journey to success in this always unpredictable industry!

10.title: Evangeline Young - Always Be Training
10.plot: Evangeline Young is an actress in the Philadelphia, known for Yes, Your Tide Is Cold and Dark, Sir (2013), Waters Rising (2007), The Otherworld (2014), and upcoming film, Red (2016). She attends the top rated acting school, Playhouse West- Philadelphia with instructor, Tony Savant. Evangeline's talent isn't limited to acting, as she is also a singer. Tune in to this episode to find out more!

11.title: Natalie Foxhill - Paintbrush Before a Pencil
11.plot: Natalie Foxhill is an actress, special effects artist, producer, and model in the Philadelphia area. She is known for her work in the recent music video "Zombie Girl" Spin (2016), and feature films including Take 2: The Audition (2015), The Grievance Group (2014) with upcoming feature, The Dark Military (2016). Natalie stays busy behind the camera as well with producing and her notable talent with special effects. Tune in to this episode to find out more about her journey in the independent film industry!

12.title: Kenneth McGregor - The Art of Storytelling
12.plot: Kenneth McGregor is an actor, director, and teacher in Philadelphia. He is known for Cocktail (1988), X-Men (2000), The Arrangement (2013), Voiceless (2015) among many other films and productions. Ken currently teaches The Affordable Acting Class as well as a Master Class at The Walking Fish Theatre. Tune in to this episode to learn more!

13.title: Mario Cerrito - Respect Through Writing
13.plot: Mario Cerrito is a writer/director from the Philadelphia area. He is best known for The Meatball (2014), Deadly Gamble (2015), and upcoming feature, The Listing (2016). Currently Mario has partnered up with fellow Philadelphia talent, The Philly Offensive, in a pilot already getting the attention of local production companies. Tune into this episode to hear what Mario has to say about his experience in the independent film world!

14.title: Julie Chapin - A Range of Roles
14.plot: Julie Chapin is an actor/producer in the Philadelphia area known best for her work in Ghost Goggles (2016), The Philly Offensive (2016), and Sangre Negra (2015). Within three short years in the industry, she would go on to perform in some 60+ productions, representing stage (The Vagina Monologues; Cupcake Cabaret; etc.), film, TV, and commercials. Julie also serves as producer/host for PetsCentral Media (LA/Hong Kong) and Princeton Public Access TV. Tune into this episode to learn more about Julie's journey in the indie film world!

15.title: Krystle Ann Griffin - Breathing Life Into Art
15.plot: Krystle Ann Griffin is an actor, makeup artist, producer, and director from the Philadelphia area. She is known for Paranormal Adventure Hunters Supreme (2014), Dark Military (2016) and Get to Know Me (2016). Not only is Krystle an incredible talent, her outgoing and infectious personality makes for great fun on sets she works on! Tune into this episode to learn more about her journey in the independent film world.

16.title: Dylan Henning - Creating Texture in Sound
16.plot: Dylan Henning is a sound designer from the Philadelphia area. He is known for his work on Youth Go to Waste (2016), The Stall (2015), The Philadelphia Independents (2016) and Flaws (2016) among many other projects. Dylan also composes music and has done so for a number of films thus far in his career. Tune in to learn more about Dylan and his life on the film scene!

17.title: Eric Foxhill - Fighting for Success
17.plot: Eric Foxhill is an actor and stunt (fight) coordinator from the Philadelphia area. He is best known for his work in Take 2- The Audition (2015), Grievance Group (2014), and the upcoming feature, The Dark Military (2016). Tune into this episode to learn more about his journey in the independent film world.

18.title: Victoria Gates - From the Stage to the Screen
18.plot: Victoria Gates is an actor and dancer from the Philadelphia area. She is best known for her work in Sea of Tranquility (2014), Voiceless (2015), and Mr. Blue Shirt: The Inspiration (2016). In addition to acting, she has danced professionally with the North Carolina Dance Theatre and then with one of the most prestigious ballet companies in the United States, the Pennsylvania Ballet. When she is not working on a project, Victoria continues her training at the Affordable Acting Class with Kenneth John McGregor. Tune in to this episode to learn more about Victoria and ...

19.title: Sonny Vellozzi - Producing Quality Content
19.plot: Sonny Vellozzi is an actor/producer out of the Philadelphia area. He his best known for his work in Unpull the Trigger (2006), I am Legend (2007), and upcoming feature films The Listing (2016) and Without You (2016). Sonny wasn't always in the acting game, but once he was, the rest as they say, is history. In a short period of time he has appeared in 20 feature films, eight commercials and 16 TV series. Tune in to learn more about Sonny and his upcoming projects!

20.title: Stuart Levy - Emotion Through Design
20.plot: Stuart Levy is a Production Designer in the Philadelphia area. He is known for his work in Amazing Race, The Today Show, Philadelphia (1993), Rocky V (1990), Mannequin: On the Move (1991) among many others. Stuart started his entertainment career as a magician and following one of his stage shows that included large-scale pyrotechnics, he was asked if he could create pyro special effects for a TV commercial. This was start of his film career. He has worked on many notable projects and continues to work with larger productions in Philadelphia, New York, and surrounding...

imdb.title: The Philadelphia Independents
plot: _The Philadelphia Independents_ (qv) is an interview series following the leading creative minds in the Philadelphia film community.
